title: How do I view contacts stored on the SIM card?
answer:
l   For EMUI 2.0 and EMUI 3.0, go to the contacts list, open the options menu and then select **Contacts to display**. Then enable the **Show SIM contacts** switch and select **All contacts**.

l   For EMUI 2.3, go to the contacts list, open the options menu and then select **Contacts to display** before selecting **All contacts**.

![note](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150805150239726001.jpg)

Please wait patiently after the SIM card has been inserted as it takes some time to load the contacts.
keywords: SIM card, contacts, address book, display
